name: Dark Redditgifts
description:
A dark/black theme for reddit gifts by /u/iPawk. Easier on the eyes and changes things up a bit ;).

If there are problems or something I missed, please let me know.

user.name: iPawk
user.about: Just a random computer scientist making things easier. Hope you enjoy my work. ;)
